parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling on hills can cause loss of power steering, making it difficult to control the vehicle, and potentially leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine dies out when taking foot off the gas pedal while driving uphill and then downhill
loss of power steering
vehicle stalls on hills.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cruise control malfunction can cause the vehicle to accelerate or decelerate unexpectedly, leading to loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The cruise control setting sticks
the vehicle accelerates or decelerates unexpectedly
the cruise control fails to disengage.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Propshaft Brake Drum Assembly Design Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the propshaft brake drum assembly can cause the transmission adapter to fail, leading to the loss of transmission fluid and ultimately resulting in transmission failure, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Bolts fall off the transmission adapter
the transmission adapter snaps off
the rear seal fails
transmission fluid leaks
transmission failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the parking brake system can cause the vehicle to roll or move unexpectedly, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The parking brake does not engage properly
the parking brake releases unexpectedly
the vehicle rolls or moves while parked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake actuator can cause the loss of brakes and power steering, leading to a significant risk of accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden loss of brakes
loss of power steering
inability to stop the vehicle
difficulty steering the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of a replacement part for the brake actuator can lead to unsafe repair practices, such as bypassing the brake actuator, which can compromise the safety of the vehicle's braking and steering systems.
symptoms: Inability to obtain a replacement brake actuator
need for bypassing the brake actuator
loss of park feature functionality.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake light switch can cause the brake lights to malfunction, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially when driving at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: The brake lights do not turn on or stay on when the brake pedal is pressed
the brake lights flicker or dim
the brake light switch melts or shows signs of overheating
the cruise control system malfunctions
the brake pedal feels spongy or soft.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system can cause unintended acceleration or deceleration, leading to loss of vehicle control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The cruise control system does not engage or disengage properly
the vehicle accelerates or decelerates unexpectedly
the brake pedal feels spongy or soft
the brake lights do not turn on or stay on when the brake pedal is pressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The illumination of the engine warning light can indicate a serious problem with the engine, potentially causing damage to the engine or its components, leading to costly repairs or even engine failure.
symptoms: The engine warning light is illuminated on the dashboard
the vehicle may experience a loss of power
the vehicle may stumble or hesitate when accelerating
the vehicle may produce unusual noises or vibrations.
